title: 关于sell hand 这个指令的权限
author: 只为不断生
txt_content:
如何禁用/sell hand 或者把所有的物品修改为0元
加入 -sell 权限还是能用啊

replies.author: 只为不断生
replies.txt_content:
逗比桃 发表于 2016-4-12 22:33
12.04 22:36:24 [Server] INFO You added '-essentials.sell' to group 'Builder' permissions.
12.04 22:36:24 [Server] INFO Couldn't retrieve your world. Default world 'world' selected.
对吗......

replies.author: rtz43
replies.txt_content: 对的，不指定世界就用默认世界咯

replies.author: 梓
replies.txt_content:
只为不断生 发表于 2016-4-12 22:34
12.04 22:36:24 [Server] INFO You added '-essentials.sell' to group 'Builder' permissions.
12.04 22 ...
对的
这个提示意思是你这个权限没有指定世界
所以默认为world这个世界
如果你的世界权限是各个世界独立的
那么你需要在每个世界都输一遍这个指令
这个权限默认是没有的吧

Instructions:         This command will sell the specified number of items.
Providing inventory/blocks will loop through the items in your inventory.
Using a negative value will sell all but the negative amount.
e.g /sell 4 -10 will sell all but 10 of that item
Permissions:         
essentials.sell         Allow access to the /sell command.

所以 /mangaddp builder -essentials.sell
